Flow.description:
FF: 23SEP, block Office Admin when converting existing customer
Flow Description: Creates a General Opportunity for a new or existing Customer.
Front-End Access: Launched from the Opportunity List View button > Create Manual Opportunity.

formulas.name: Link_Bond
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!bondOppIdVar}, "Click here to Navigate to the Bond Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: Link_CreateGeneral
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!generalOppVarId}, "Click here to Navigate to the General Opportunity" , '_top')

Flow.label: Manual Opportunity Creation

fields.name: campaignError
fields.fieldText: Please select a Campaign.

fields.name: existingReq
fields.fieldText: Please choose an existing customer to use the "Continue with existing Customer" option

fields.name: existingReq_0
fields.fieldText: Please choose an existing customer to use the "Convert Existing Customer" option

value.stringValue: Select the agent that provided the opportunity

fields.name: agentNotSelectedError
fields.fieldText: Please choose an agent before continuing

fields.name: saveOrCntDisp_0_0
fields.fieldText:
General Opportunity successfully created:


  • Opportunity Name: {!generalOpportunityNameFormula}
  • Customer Name: {!personAccount.FirstName} {!personAccount.LastName}
  • Phone: {!personAccount.Phone}
  • Email: {!personAccount.PersonEmail}

{!Link_CreateGeneral}

fields.name: bondCreated
fields.fieldText:
Bond Opportunity successfully created:


  • Opportunity Name: {!Get_Bond_Opp.Name}
  • Customer Name: {!personAccount.FirstName} {!personAccount.LastName}
  • Phone: {!Get_Bond_Opp.Account.Phone}
  • Email: {!Get_Bond_Opp.Account.PersonEmail}

{!Link_Bond}

fields.name: Opportunity_Owner
fields.fieldText: Opportunity Owner

value.stringValue: Select the agent that provided the opportunity
AND( Profile.Name = 'Consultant' OR Profile.name = 'Team Lead') AND IsActive = TRUE ORDER BY Name

fields.name: selectAgentError
fields.fieldText: Please search for a name before continuing

fields.name: timezoneError
fields.fieldText:
Please review the Region user setup for this opportunity's owner and try again: {!Get_Selected_Owner_User.FirstName} 


The user Region is required to populate a Reference Number.

fields.name: campaignSLAerrorMsg
fields.fieldText:
The campaign that you have selected for this opportunity does not have a SLA populated:

  • Campaign: {!Get_Campaign_Selected.Name}

Please ensure that the missing campaign setup data is captured and try gain.

fields.name: adminBlockHelp
fields.fieldText:
The Profile that you are assigned to only allows for creating opportunities on behalf of someone.


Please click on Next and select the above mentioned option. Ensure to search and select the consultant you are creating for.

fields.name: bondCreated_0
fields.fieldText:
Bond Opportunity successfully created:


  • Opportunity Name: {!Get_Bond_Opp_0.Name}
  • Customer Name: {!personAccount.FirstName} {!personAccount.LastName}
  • Phone: {!Get_Bond_Opp_0.Account.Phone}
  • Email: {!Get_Bond_Opp_0.Account.PersonEmail}

{!Link_Bond}

fields.name: generalOppCreated
fields.fieldText:
General Opportunity successfully created:


  • Opportunity Name: {!repeatGenOppName}
  • Customer Name: {!personAccount.FirstName} {!personAccount.LastName}
  • Phone: {!personAccount.Phone}
  • Email: {!personAccount.PersonEmail}

{!Link_CreateGeneral}

fields.name: generalOppCreated_0
fields.fieldText:
General Opportunity successfully created:


  • Opportunity Name: {!repeatGenOppName}
  • Customer Name: {!personAccount.FirstName} {!personAccount.LastName}
  • Phone: {!personAccount.Phone}
  • Email: {!personAccount.PersonEmail}

{!Link_CreateGeneral}

validationRule.errorMessage: Only the first letter should be capital.

fields.fieldText: First Name must be specified.

fields.fieldText: Last Name must be specified.

fields.fieldText: Phone

fields.fieldText: This phone number already exists on the system.

fields.name: Email_Field
fields.fieldText: Email

fields.name: duplicateEmail
fields.fieldText: This email address already exists on the system. Please look up the customer on the previous screen.

fields.name: textMessageHelp
fields.fieldText: Phone or Email must be specified.

fields.name: Comment_opp
fields.fieldText: Notes

fields.name: caseError
fields.fieldText: A Verification is in progress. You are not able to convert the opportunity until the verification has been completed:

fields.name: verificationInProgress
fields.fieldText: {!Get_Open_Case_on_Opp.Subject}

fields.name: statVerify
fields.fieldText: Verification Status: {!Get_Open_Case_on_Opp.Status}

fields.name: helpText_0_0
fields.fieldText: The following Opportunities already exist for Person Account {!personAccount.FirstName} {!personAccount.LastName}.

fields.name: OpenOppsTxt2
fields.fieldText:
The following Opportunities linked to this customer are still open:

{!finalOpenOppsVar}

fields.name: selectGenTxt
fields.fieldText: Please select the General Opportunity that you would like to convert into a Bond:

fields.name: selectGenOptionTxt
fields.fieldText:
Please select the General Opportunity that you would like to:

  • Convert into a Bond
  • Create a new General Opportunity

fields.name: emptyOppSelect
fields.fieldText: Please select an Opportunity to continue

value.stringValue: Upload OTP - Convert to Bond Opportunity

fields.name: helpText_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: The following Bond Opportunity already exists for Person Account {!personAccount.FirstName} {!personAccount.LastName}:

fields.name: openOppsTxt
fields.fieldText:
The following Opportunities linked to this customer are still open:

{!finalOpenOppsVar}

fields.name: txtOptions
fields.fieldText: You have the option to create a new General Opportunity for this customer.

fields.fieldText: The following Opportunities already exist for Person Account {!personAccount.FirstName} {!personAccount.LastName}:

fields.fieldText:
The following Opportunities linked to this customer are still open:

{!finalOpenOppsVar}

fields.name: convertTxt
fields.fieldText: Please select the Pre-Approval Opportunity that you would like to convert into a Bond:

fields.name: optionTxt
fields.fieldText: Please select the Pre-Approval Opportunity that you would like to convert into a Bond, alternatively a new General Opportunity can be created:

fields.name: emptyOpp
fields.fieldText: Please select an Opportunity to continue.

fields.name: only1Allowed
fields.fieldText: You are only able to select one Opportunity to convert.

value.stringValue: Upload OTP - Convert to Bond Opportunity

fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}
